reviewText:
Good: simple story, family friendly, tries to promote family values, good acting
Bad: very slow, obvious and plodding plot.  The summary makes it seem like there is some mystery they have to solve, anyone over 9 or 10 will immediately recognize the "Scooby-Doo" random statements which point to everything the movie is about in the first few minutes.  My oldest two kids walked away it is so boring.
ok.  Clean.  The story line is odd and not connected.  But clean
Not a good movie. Plot was slow. Main characters dilemma is far fetched. Bad guys reason for wanting to get rid of him is even more far fetched.
Great family movie. I wish they would make more of these. Lots of good clean humor and a nice moral to the story.
I like all of the WalMart/P&G family movie night movies. I like the values that emerge in these movies. At this point, there are nine of them. Check out familymovienight.com
